author.name: Joshua Jones
author.bio: I am a former mechanical engineer making the transition to software engineering in 2020, I was lucky enough to find a great remote job with the basics that I already knew, and now I'm making 2020 the year I learn to build professional web apps.

siteMetadata.title: Blog by Joshua Jones
siteMetadata.subtitle: Personal site of Joshua Jones a Mechanical Engineer building Software Engineering skills in 2020.
